effect.name: Krita Arcus Tangens (Background)
effect.description:
(The effect comes from the Krita) It divides the bottom layer by the top layer. It then divides it by Pi. It then uses this in the arcus tangent function and multiplies it by two
Last Updated: 2026-01-11 00:55
effect.author: Foxioo

parameter.name: /* Foxioo Krita Arcus Tangens (Background) Shader | 1.3 (18.10.2025) */
parameter.description: (The effect comes from the Krita) - It divides the bottom layer by the top layer. It then divides it by Pi. It then uses this in the arcus tangent function and multiplies it by two

parameter.name: Blending Mode
parameter.description: This variable manages which color will be the divider. When this value is set to 0 then blend will divide base and when set to 1 then base will divide blend.

parameter.name: Mixing
parameter.description: This variable is responsible for the visibility of the effect.

parameter.name: ( Compatibility )
parameter.description: Here you will find options that have changed, but you can still achieve the previous effect.

parameter.name: Is Fusion Version Older Than 296?
parameter.description: (Only applies to Android and iOS!) This variable determines whether to use the newer background formatting. In Clickteam Fusion 2.5 for build 295.10 and earlier, the background texture was flipped along the Y axis, but this was changed in build 296.1. Check this option if you are using an older build!
